pr_title: Bugfix for an NPE that occured when using the split nodes plugin

timeline.bodyText:
I would just add this condition to the old tertiary operator.
i.e. final String character = splitParameters.get(SPLIT_PARAMETER_ID) != null && splitParameters.get(SPLIT_PARAMETER_ID).getStringValue() != null ? ...
timeline.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: Yeah, that looks cleaner. Thanks for that @antares1470
replies.author: formalhaut69
